1887992.effect: If 3 or more monster effects have been activated this turn (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Chronoruler" Spell/Trap from your hand or GY; Special Summon this card from your hand in Defense Position, then you can draw 1 card for every 3 monster effects your opponent has activated this turn. If the turn count is 5 or lower, neither player takes damage, also, this card cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. If the turn count is 6 or higher, your opponent cannot target this card with card effects. Once per turn: You can target 1 monster on the field; destroy it. You can only Special Summon "Chronoruler of Vice(s)" once per turn.
1887992.name: Chronoruler of Vice

1887990.effect: If 3 or more Spell Cards or effects have been activated this turn (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Chronoruler" Spell/Trap from your hand or GY; Special Summon this card from your hand in Defense Position, then you can banish 1 card from the top of your Deck for every 3 Spell Cards or effects your opponent has activated this turn. If the turn count is 5 or lower, neither player takes damage, also, this card cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. If the turn count is 6 or higher, your opponent cannot target this card with card effects. Once per turn: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it if it is a Spell (if that card is Set, reveal it). You can only Special Summon "Chronoruler of Law(s)" once per turn.
1887990.name: Chronoruler of Law

1887987.effect: If 3 or more Trap Cards or effects have been activated this turn (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Chronoruler" Spell/Trap from your hand or GY; Special Summon this card from your hand in Defense Position, then you can banish 1 card from either GY for every 3 Trap Cards or effects your opponent has activated this turn. If the turn count is 5 or lower, neither player takes damage, also, this card cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. If the turn count is 6 or higher, your opponent cannot target this card with card effects. Once per turn: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it if it is a Trap (if that card is Set, reveal it). You can only Special Summon "Chronoruler of Prosperity(s)" once per turn.
1887987.name: Chronoruler of Prosperity

1887986.effect:
All "Chronoruler" monster(s) on the field gain 100 ATK/DEF for each banished Spell. Monsters your opponent controls lose 100 ATK/DEF for each banished Trap. Once per turn if this card would leave the field by an opponent's card effect, you can shuffle 2 of your banished cards (1 Spell and 1 Trap) into the Deck instead. Once per turn, if a monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned: You can apply this effect, depending on whose turn it is.
●Your turn: Banish 1 "Chronoruler" Spell from your Deck.
●Opponent's turn: Banish 1 "Chronoruler" Trap from your Deck.
1887986.name: Chronoruler Mobius Plane

1887984.effect: Special Summon 1 Level 11 monster from your hand, then, during the End Phase of this turn, banish 1 "Chronoruler" Spell/Trap from your Deck. If you control a "Chronoruler" monster: You can shuffle this banished card into the Deck; neither player can declare an attack until the end of the next turn, also if the turn count is 6 or higher, you can draw 1 card. You can only use 1 "Chronoruler's Commandment" effect per turn, and only once that turn. If this card would be sent from the field to the GY, banish this card instead.
1887984.name: Chronoruler's Commandment

1887983.effect: Special Summon 1 Level 11 monster from your hand, then during the End Phase of this turn, banish 1 Spell/Trap from your hand. If you control a "Chronoruler" monster: You can shuffle this banished card into the Deck; add 1 of your banished "Chronoruler" cards to your hand, and if you do, if the turn count is 6 or higher, you can have both players draw 1 card. You can only use 1 "Chronoruler's Graciousness" effect per turn, and only once that turn. If this card would be sent from the field to the GY, banish this card instead.
1887983.name: Chronoruler's Graciousness

1887980.effect: Special Summon 1 Level 11 monster from your hand, then, during the End Phase of this turn, banish 1 Spell/Trap from your GY. If you control a "Chronoruler" monster: You can shuffle this banished card into the Deck; banish 1 card from each GY, also if the turn count is 6 or higher, you can draw 1 card. You can only use 1 "Chronoruler's Authority" effect per turn, and only once that turn. If this card would be sent from the field to the GY, banish this card instead.
1887980.name: Chronoruler's Authority

1887977.effect: During your opponent's turn: Special Summon 1 of your banished "Chronoruler" monsters, and if you do, if the turn count is 5 or lower, you can destroy 1 Spell/Trap on the field. During your turn, if you control no monsters, OR if all monsters you control are "Chronoruler" monster (min.1): You can shuffle this banished card into the Deck; take 1 "Chronoruler" monster from your Deck, and either add it to your hand or banish it. You can only use each effect of "Chronoruler's Anger" once per turn.
1887977.name: Chronoruler's Anger

1887975.effect: During your opponent's turn: Special Summon 1 "Chronoruler" monster from your GY, and if you do, if the turn count is 5 or lower, you can destroy 1 Set card on the field. During your turn, if you control no monsters, OR if all monsters you control are "Chronoruler" monster (min.1): You can shuffle this banished card into the Deck; take 1 "Chronoruler" Spell from your Deck, and either add it to your hand or banish it. You can only use each effect of "Chronoruler's Vindication" once per turn.
1887975.name: Chronoruler's Vindication

1887970.effect: During your opponent's turn: Special Summon 1 "Chronoruler" monster from your hand, and if you do, if the turn count is 5 or lower, you can destroy 1 face-up card on the field. During your turn, if you control no monsters, OR if all monsters you control are "Chronoruler" monster (min.1): You can shuffle this banished card into the Deck; take 1 "Chronoruler" Trap from your Deck to your hand, except "Chronoruler's Suppression", and either add it to your hand or banish it. You can only use each effect of "Chronoruler's Suppression" once per turn.
1887970.name: Chronoruler's Suppression

1890937.effect: If you control a "Shark Drake" or "Silent Honour" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is detached from a "Shark Drake" or "Silent Honour" monster as material; you can add 1 "Silent Honour" or "Shark Drake" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Baby Shark Drake" once per turn.
1890937.name: Baby Shark Drake

1890952.effect:
(This card is always treated as a "Shark Drake" monster.) If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Shark Drake" or "Silent Honour" monster from your hand or GY. Cannot be used for an Xyz Summon, except for a WATER monster. If this card is in your GY, and you control a "Silent Honour" or "Shark Drake" Xyz Monster; you can attach this card from your GY to that card as material. An Xyz Monster with this card as material gains the following effect:
● This monster gains 500 ATK
You can only use each effect of "Menace Water Drake" once per turn.
1890952.name: Menace Water Drake

1890961.effect: (This card is always treated as a "Shark Drake" card.) If you control a "Shark Drake" or "Silent Honour" Xyz Monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, this card can be treated as 2 monsters for the Xyz Summon of a "Silent Honour" or "Shark Drake" monster. You can only use this effect of "Silent Honour Progidy 2" once per turn.
1890961.name: Silent Honour Progidy 2

1890958.effect: (This card is also treated as a "Shark Drake" card.) If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Silent Honour" or "Shark Drake" card from your Deck to your hand. For the Xyz Summon of a WATER Xyz Monster, you can use this card in your GY as material, but if you do, you can only Special Summon once for the rest of the turn. You can only use each effect of "Silent Honour Progidy 1" once per turn.
1890958.name: Silent Honour Progidy 1

1890989.effect: Add 1 "Shark Drake" or "Silent Honour" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use 1 "Big Wave" per turn.
1890989.name: Big Wave

1890981.effect: (This card is always treated as a "Silent Honour" and a "Shark Drake" card.) Target 1 "Silent Honour" or "Shark Drake" Xyz Monster you control: Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 WATER Xyz Monster 1 or 2 Ranks higher, by using it as material. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon. Transfer its materials to the Summoned monster.) If your "Shark Drake" or "Silent Honour" monster destroys an opponents monster by battle, and this card is in your GY; you can set this card to your field, but banish it when it leaves the field;. You can only each effect of "Rank-Up-Magic Hurricane Force" once per turn.
1890981.name: Rank-Up-Magic Hurricane Force

1890926.effect:
4 Level 4 WATER monsters
You can also Xyz Summon this card by using a "Number 32: Shark Drake" you control as the Xyz Material. (Xyz Materials attached to that monster also become Xyz Materials on this card.) During either player's turn: You can detach 1 material from this card and banish 1 monster from your GY to target 1 face-up monster on the field; that target's ATK and DEF become 0 until the End Phase, and if its your opponents turn, that monster must battle this monster during this turn, and if it does not; banish it during the End Phase. If this card destroys an opponents monster by battle: This card can make a second attack in a row. You can only use each effect of "Number C32: Shark Drake Veiss: Abyssal Encounter" once per turn.
1890926.name: Number C32: Shark Drake Veiss: Abyssal Encounter
1890926.treated_as: Number C32: Shark Drake Veiss: Abyssal Encounter

1890997.effect:
4 Level 5 WATER monsters
You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 "Silent Honour" or "Shark Drake" monster in your GY: Special Summon it, then, if it was an Xyz Monster, its effects are negated until the end of the turn. If you control another "Shark Drake" or "Silent Honour" monster; you can make the ATK of 1 face-up monster your opponent controls 0, and if you do, its effects are negated. If this card destroys an opponents monster by battle: You can attach that card to another Xyz Monster you control as material. If this card would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can detach 1 material from this card instead. You can only use each effect of "Number C34: Armoured Shark Drake Veiss" once per turn.
1890997.name: Number C34: Armoured Shark Drake Veiss
1890997.treated_as: Number C34: Armoured Shark Drake Veiss

1764472.effect:
4 Level 5 monsters
(This card's name is always treated as "Number C32: Shark Drake Veiss" and "Number C101: Silent Honor Dark"). 
This card must be Special Summoned from the Extra Deck, by targeting 1 "Shark Drake" or "Silent Honour" monster you control with a "Rank-Up-Magic" Spell card, and cannot be Special Summoned by any other ways. Cannot be destroyed by card effects. When this card leaves the field because of an opponent's card effect, while it has material: Special Summon this card from your GY, then gain LP equal to this card's original ATK. (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 monster on the field; change its ATK to 0, and if you do, attach it to this card as material. You can only use each effect of "Number C101: Silent Drake Knight Veiss" once per turn. During your opponent's End Phase, attach 1 card from your GY to this card as material.
1764472.name: Number C101: Silent Drake Knight Veiss
1764472.treated_as: Number C101: Silent Drake Knight Veiss

1869639.effect: If you control an "Ashen" monster, or your opponent controls a FIRE monster, you can reveal this card in your hand: Special Summon this card from your hand and, if possible, 1 "Ashen Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) to your opponents side of the field, then you can make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as a FIRE attribute monster. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Ashen" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Spirit, Descendant of the Blazing Fire" once per turn. You cannot Summon monsters the turn this card is Summoned, or its effects are activated, except FIRE monsters.
1869639.name: Ashen Spirit, Descendant of the Blazing Fire
1869639.treated_as: Ashen Spirit, Descendant of the Blazing Fire

1877167.effect: If you control an "Ashen" monster, or your opponent controls a FIRE monster, you can reveal this card in your hand: Special Summon this card from your hand and, if possible, 1 "Ashen Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) to your opponents side of the field, then you can make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as a FIRE attribute monster.If a "Ashen" monster is Synchro Summoned, while this card is in yoir GY: You can Special Summon this card from your GY, but banish it when it leaves the field, then you can Special Summon 1 "Ashen Token" to your opponents side of the field. You can only use this effect of "Ashen Wanderer, Descendant of the Blazing Fog" once per turn. You cannot Summon monsters the turn this card is Summoned, or its effects are activated, except FIRE monsters.
1877167.name: Ashen Wanderer, Descendant of the Blazing Fog
1877167.treated_as: Ashen Wanderer, Descendant of the Blazing Fog

1885911.effect: If you control an "Ashen" monster, or your opponent controls a FIRE monster, you can reveal this card in your hand: Special Summon this card from your hand and, if possible, 1 "Ashen Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) to your opponents side of the field, then you can make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as a FIRE attribute monster. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Collector, Descendant of the Blazing Spirits" once per turn. 1877068.effect: If you control an "Ashen" monster, or your opponent controls a FIRE monster, you can reveal this card in your hand: Special Summon this card from your hand and, if possible, 1 "Ashen Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) to your opponents side of the field, then you can make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as a FIRE attribute monster. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, you can discard 1 card: Excavate the top 5 cards of your Deck: Special Summon 1 excavated "Ashen" monster, but its effects are negated, then shuffle the other 4 excavated cards into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Archer, Descendant of the Blazing Bows" once per turn. 1885906.effect: If you control an "Ashen" monster, or your opponent controls a FIRE monster, you can reveal this card in your hand: Special Summon this card from your hand and, if possible, 1 "Ashen Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) to your opponents side of the field, then you can make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as a FIRE attribute monster. 1885906.name: Ashen Slicer, Descendant of the Blazing Swords
1885906.treated_as: Ashen Slicer, Descendant of the Blazing Swords

1869686.effect: If you control an "Ashen" monster, or your opponent controls a FIRE monster, you can reveal this card in your hand: Special Summon this card from your hand and, if possible, 1 "Ashen Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) to your opponents side of the field, then you can make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as a FIRE attribute monster. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Ashen" monster from your hand or GY. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Ghoul, Descendant of the Blazing Shadows" once per turn. 1869686.treated_as: Ashen Ghoul, Descendant of the Blazing Shadows

1885956.effect: All "Ashen" monsters you control gain 300 ATK. If your opponent controls 4 or more FIRE monsters, you can look at your opponents Extra Deck and banish 1 monster in it. If an "Ashen" monster leaves your field because of your opponents card or effect, you can pay 1000 LP: Add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Devistation" once per turn.
1885956.name: Ashen Devistation

1879007.effect: If this card is activated: You can add 1 "Ashen" monster from your Deck to your hand. If your opponent Special Summons a monster, you can target that monster; it becomes treated as a FIRE Attribute monster. If an "Ashen" monster is Synchro Summoned, while your opponent controls a FIRE Normal monster, you can target 1 monster your opponent controls: It loses 500 ATK. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Temple of The Burning Descendants" once per turn. You cannot Summon monsters the turn this card is activated, except FIRE monsters.
1879007.name: Ashen Temple of The Burning Descendants
1879007.treated_as: Ashen Temple of The Burning Descendants

1885938.effect: Equip to a monster your opponent controls. It loses 500 ATK, it cannot activate its effects and its name becomes "Ashen Pawn". If the equipped monster is sent to the GY, the owner of this card can Special Summon 1 "Ashen" monster from their GY. You can only activate 1 "Assault of the Ashen Spirits" per turn.
1885938.name: Assault of the Ashen Spirits

1879056.effect:
1 "Ashen" Tuner monster + 1+non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned, you can target 1 Level 4 or lower "Ashen" monster in your GY: Special Summon it, buts its effects are negated. Once per Chain, during your opponent's Main Phase, you can (Quick Effect): Immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon using this card you control. A "Ashen" monster Synchro Summoned by this effect can activate 1 of its effects as a Quick Effect. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Goliath, Descendant of the Blazing Giants" once per turn.
1879056.name: Ashen Goliath, Descendant of the Blazing Giants
1879056.treated_as: Ashen Goliath, Descendant of the Blazing Giants

1877145.effect:
1 "Ashen" Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
(Quick Effect) You can Special Summon 1 "Ashen Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) to your opponents side of the field, then make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as a FIRE attribute monster. This monster gains the following effects based on the number of FIRE Attribute monsters on the field:
●2: You can destroy 1 FIRE Normal Monster on the field, then target 1 monster on the field: Destroy it.
●4: The first time this card would be destroyed by card effect per turn, it is not.
●6: During the Battle Phase, if this card declares an attack on an opponents monster: You can banish that monster, and if you do, this card can make a second attack during the Battle Phase this turn, and if it does, it gains 100 ATK for each FIRE monster on the field.
You can only use each effect of "Ashen Phoenix, Descendant of the Blazing Inferno" once per turn.
1877145.name: Ashen Phoenix, Descendant of the Blazing Inferno
1877145.treated_as: Ashen Phoenix, Descendant of the Blazing Inferno

1862987.effect:
1 "Ashen" Tuner monster + 1+ non-Tuner monsters.
(Quick Effect) You can Special Summon 1 "Ashen Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) to your opponents side of the field, then make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as a FIRE attribute monster. This monster gains the following effects based on the number of FIRE Attribute monsters on the field:
●2: You can target 1 card on the field: Banish it
●4: Cannot be targeted by card effects.
●6: FIRE monsters you control inflict double battle damage, and inflict piercing battle damage.
●8: You can send all other face-up cards on the field to the GY, and if you do, your opponent takes no battle damage for the rest of the turn.
You can only use each effect of "Ashen Dragon, Descendant of the Blazing Star" once per turn.
1862987.name: Ashen Dragon, Descendant of the Blazing Star
1862987.treated_as: Ashen Dragon, Descendant of the Blazing Star

1885922.effect:
2 "Ashen" monsters
If an "Ashen" monster is Synchro Summoned to a zone this card points to, and all monsters this card points to are FIRE Attribute, you can target 1 card on the field: Destroy it. If a FIRE Attribute monster is Special Summoned to your opponents side of the field to a zone this card points to; You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Ashen" monster from your hand or GY. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Paladin" Descendant of the Blazing Front Lines" once per turn.
1885922.name: Ashen Paladin, Descendant of the Blazing Front Lines
1885922.treated_as: Ashen Paladin, Descendant of the Blazing Front Lines

1879100.effect:
3+ "Ashen" monsters
Synchro monsters can be treated as 2 Link Materials for the Link Summon of this card. You can target as many monsters your opponent controls, up to the amount of monsters that this card points to, apply these effects in sequence:
●Banish those monsters
●Monsters your opponent controls that point to this card become treated as FIRE Attribute monsters.
● Special Summon 1 "Ashen" Synchro Monster from your GY to a zone this card points to, but until the end of the turn, its effects are negated, and it cannot attack, then take 1000 damage.
You can only use each effect of "Ashen Reaper, Descendant of the Blazing Scythe" once per turn.
1879100.name: Ashen Reaper, Descendant of the Blazing Scythe
1879100.treated_as: Ashen Reaper, Descendant of the Blazing Scythe

1501067.effect: Your opponent cannot target face-up "Frostyre" monsters you control for attacks, except "Frostyre Guard Hail". If this card is Normal Summoned, It gains 500 ATK/DEF. If you have no Spell/Trap cards in your GY, you can target 1 "Frostyre" monster you control; Tribute it, and if you do, target up to 2 Spell/Trap cards your opponent controls; Destroy them. You can only use each effect of "Frostyre Guard Hail" once per turn.
1501067.name: Frostyre Guard Hail

1501013.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by paying 1000 LP, and while you have no Spells/Traps in your GY. If this card is Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Frostyre" monster from your hand or Deck, except "Frostyre King Leviathan", and if you do, reduce its Level by 1, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Frostyre" monsters.
1501013.name: Frostyre King Leviathan

1501075.effect: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Frostyre" Spell/Trap Card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Frostyre Paladin Cold" once per turn. If this card leaves the field, or is sent to the GY: Shuffle it into the Deck: Switch the original ATK and DEF of all "Frostyre" monsters you control. You must have no Spell/Trap cards in your GY to actiavte or resolve this cards' effects.
1501075.name: Frostyre Paladin Cold

1501032.effect: Cannot be destroyed by battle while in Attack Position. If you have no Spell/Trap cards in your GY, you can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Frostyre" monster from your Deck, but shuffle it into the Deck during the End Phase of your next turn. You can only use this effect of "Frostyre Queen Blizzaria" once per turn.
1501032.name: Frostyre Queen Blizzaria

1501218.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card using "Call of the Frostyrean Void". You can discard 1 card; Add 1 "Frostyre" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Arielle, The El Frostyre Invoker" once per turn.
1501218.name: Arielle, The El Frostyre Invoker

1501162.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card using "Call of the Frostyrean Void". "Frostyre" monsters you control can attack while in face-up Defense Position. If they do, apply their DEF for damage calculation. You can target any number of "Frostyre" cards in your GY; Shuffle them into the Deck, then add 1 "Frostyre" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Hel, The El Frostyre Executioner" once per turn.
1501162.name: Hel, The El Frostyre Executioner

1501201.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card using "Call of the Frostyrean Void". If this card is in your GY, and you have no Spell/Trap cards in your GY, you can shuffle this card into the Deck; until your opponent's next End Phase, neither player can add cards from their Deck to their hand, except by drawing them. You can tribute 1 monster; Draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Jormungandr, The El Frostyre Serpent" once per turn.
1501201.name: Jormungandr, The El Frostyre Serpent

1501375.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card using "Call of the Frostyrean Void". If this card is in your GY, and you have no Spell/Trap cards in your GY: You can shuffle this card into the Deck; neither players can activate card effects in the GY, until the end of this turn. You can tribute this monster; Add 1 "Frostyre" Spell/Trap card from your Deck to your hand, also discard 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Snowflake, The El Frostyre Shadow" once per turn.
1501375.name: Snowflake, The El Frostyre Shadow

1503643.effect: This card can be used to Ritual Summon any "Frostyre" Ritual Monster from your hand. You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field, and/or shuffle "Frostyre" monsters from your GY into the Deck, whose total Levels equal or exceed the Level of the Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon +1. If a "Frostyre" Ritual Monster you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can shuffle this card from your GY into the Deck, and any number of "Frostyre" cards from your GY, instead.
1503643.name: Call of the Frostyrean Void

1503209.effect:
All "Frostyre" monsters gain 500 DEF. Once per turn, you can activate 1 of these effects:
● Pay 1000 Life Points; add 1 "Frostyre" monster from your Deck to your hand, except a Ritual Monster.
● You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY; send 1 "Frostyre" monster from your Deck to the GY.
When a card is shuffled from your GY into your Deck, you can add it to your hand instead. If you control "Frostyre King Leviathan" when this effect was activated, you can Special Summon it instead. You can only activate 1 "Frostyre Castle" effect per turn.
1503209.name: Frostyre Castle

1503222.effect: This card can be used to Ritual Summon any "Frostyre" Ritual Monster from your Deck. You must also shuffle monsters from your field, and/or shuffle any number of "Frostyre" monsters from your GY into the Deck, whose total Levels equal or exceed the Level of the Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon +1. The Ritual Summoned monster is destroyed during the End Phase. You can shuffle this card frfom your GY into the Deck; both players draw 1 card. You can only activate 1 "Frostyrean Respiteful Call" effect per turn.
1503222.name: Frostyrean Respiteful Call

1505181.effect: Every time a monster is shuffled into the Deck, all monsters your opponent controls lose 100 ATK. You can send this card to they GY: All monsters you control gain 1000 DEF. If this card is in your GY, you can shuffle it into the Deck, and any number of "Frostyre" cards. You can only activate 1 "Frostyre Ascendancy" effect per turn.
1505181.name: Frostyre Ascendancy

1505194.effect: When your opponent declares an attack, you can activate this card: Shuffle 2 cards from your GY into the Deck; End the Battle Phase. If you shuffled "Frostyre" cards with this effect, it becomes the End Phase instead, also skip your Draw Phase. If this card is in your GY, you can shuffle it into the Deck, and any number of "Frostyre" cards in your GY into the Deck. You can only use 1 "Frostyre Wave" effect per turn.
1505194.name: Frostyre Wave

1503615.effect: During the Battle Phase, if a Level 4 or lower "Frostyre" monster battles a monster your opponent controls with higher ATK: Shuffle 1 card from your field or GY into the Deck; Special Summon 1 Level 5 or higher "Frostyre" monster from your Deck. If you have no Spell/Traps cards in your GY at this cards' activation, monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle this turn. If this card is in your GY; shuffle it into the Deck, and any number of "Frostyre" cards in your GY into the Deck. You can only activate 1 "Frostyrean Distress Signal" effect per turn.
1503615.name: Frostyrean Distress Signal

1891642.effect: You can Special Summon this card in Defense Position (from your hand or Deck) by sending 1 "Mad Lobster" you control to the GY. Once per turn, during your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can activate this effect, also you can Tribute 1 other WATER monster in your hand or that you control; return this card to your hand, and if you Tributed a monster to activate this effect, you can add 1 "Mad Lobster" from your GY to your hand.
1891642.name: Dr. Zoidberg

1891648.effect: Reveal 1 monster in your hand or target 1 monster in your GY that cannot be Normal Summoned/Set and must be Special Summoned by the effect of 1 card that is Specifically listed in its text; banish the listed card from your hand, Deck, or GY, and if you do, Special Summon that monster in Defense Position ignoring its Summoning Conditions (it is treated as being Summoned by the effect of the banished card).
1891648.name: Loophole Summon #471

1891741.effect: If this card is on the field or in your GY, you can activate the effect of "Winged Kuriboh LV 10" when Tributed to activate its own effect during the Phases of both player's turn instead of your opponent's Main Phase. If a "Winged Kuriboh LV10(s)" you control would Tribute itself to activate its effect, you can Tribute this card you control or banish this card from your GY instead. If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 1 "Transcendent Wings" from your GY to your hand or return 1 of your banished Level 1 "Kuriboh" monsters to the GY, OR if this card was sent to the GY to activate "Transcendent Wings", you can Special Summon this card instead. You can only use this effect of "Winged Kuriboh LV11" once per turn.
1891741.name: Winged Kuriboh LV11

1891825.effect:
Activate 1 of these effects. You cannot activate that same effect of "Token Terror" again this turn. While you control a Token(s) that were Special Summoned by this card, you cannot Special Summon monsters from your Extra Deck.
● Banish any number of other "Token" cards with different names from your field and/or GY; Special Summon "Holiday Token(s)" (Fiend/EARTH/Level 2/ATK 0/DEF 0), up to the number of cards you bansihed.
● Tribute any number of Tokens you control; add "Token" cards with different names from your Deck to your hand, except "Token Terror", up to the number of monsters you Tributed.
● Tribute any number of Tokens you control; Special Summon 1 "Terror Token" (Fiend/EARTH/Level 2/ATK ?/DEF ?) with original ATK/DEF equal to the combined Levels of the Tributed monsters x 500.
1891825.name: Token Terror

1891828.effect:
Once per turn, during the Standby Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Holiday Token" (Fiend/EARTH/Level 2/ATK 0/DEF 0), but it cannot be used as material for a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Token Town" per turn, and only once that turn.
● If a Spell/Trap card or effect is activated, except "Token Town". You can Special Summon 1 "Holiday Token" (Fiend/EARTH/Level 2/ATK 0/DEF 0), but it cannot be used as material for a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon. 
● If a Token(s) is Special Summoned or if a Token(s) you control leaves the field: You can add 1 "Token" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Token Town".
1891828.name: Token Town

1891833.effect: Target 1 face-up Continuous Spell/Trap on the field; activate up to 2 Spell/Trap card from your Deck, with the same name as the target, but if its text is greater than 15 words, its effects are negated. You can only activate 1 "Doubled Down" per turn.
1891833.name: Doubled Down

1891836.effect: Equip to a monster that was not Special Summoned from the Extra Deck. The equipped monster gains ATK/DEF equal to the difference between your LP and your opponent's, also other monsters you control cannot Attack. If either player loses LP: Their opponent gains the same amount of LP.
1891836.name: Stalemate Scepter

1891838.effect: If you control no Effect Monsters: Draw 1 card, then, Special Summon any number of Normal Monsters from your hand (min. 1). You cannot Summon Effect monsters the turn you activate this card. You can only activate 1 "Normal Rush" per turn.
1891838.name: Normal Rush

1891872.effect:
Send 1 "gigo" monster or 1 "Jigabyte" from your hand or field to the GY; apply these effects, in sequence, depending on what the monster was before it was sent, if it was any of these.
● non-Effect Monster: Special Summon 1 WATER Reptile monster from your GY.
● Level/Rank 4 or higher: Gain LP equal to its ATK or DEF (Whichever is higher).
● Level/Rank 6 or higher: Draw 1 card.
● Level/Rank 8 or higher: Destroy 1 Spell/Trap.
● Xyz Monster: Destroy 1 monster.
You can only use activate 1 "Giga-Jiga" per turn.
1891872.name: Giga-Jiga

1891876.effect:
2 Level 8 Reptile monsters
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon "Gagogiga Gagagigo" by using "Gagagigo the Risen" you control as material. (Transfer its materials to this card.) If all monsters you control and have in your GY are Reptile monsters: You can detach 1 material from a Reptile Xyz Monster you control; apply 1 of the following effects or, if you detached a non-effect Reptile monster, you can apply both effects in sequence. This is a Quick Effect if all monsters you control and have in your GY are WATER monsters.
● Destroy 1 face-up card on the field.
● You can add to your hand, or Special Summon in Defense Position, 1 WATER Reptile monster from your Deck.
You can only use this effect of "Gagogiga Gagagigo" once per turn.
1891876.name: Gagogiga Gagagigo

1890045.effect: 2+ Level 6 Psychic monstersWhen this card is Xyz Summoned while a card(s) is currently revealed in the hand to activate its own effect: You can shuffle that currently revealed card(s) from the hand into the Deck. You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 Psychic monster in your GY; add 1 "Mind Haxorz" or 1 "Mind Over Matter" from your Deck to your hand, then place that target on top of your Deck. You can reveal 1 "Mind Haxorz" in your hand, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; switch its current ATK and DEF, then you can activate 1 "Mind Haxorz" from your hand. You can only use each effect of "Tele-Ranger - Mind Jumper" once per turn.
1890045.name: Tele-Ranger - Mind Jumper

1890154.effect: 2+ Level 6 monstersYou can detach 1 material from this card; shuffle all Warrior monsters on the field into the Deck. Once per turn, if you control a WATER monster(s) or a Psychic monster(s): You can activate this effect; this card gains 2800 ATK until the end of this turn. When a monster declares an attack: You can add 1 "Psychic Fervor" from your Deck to your hand, then return that attacking monster to the hand.
1890154.name: Melene, Awakened Psycho Hunter

1834020.effect: 3+ Level 6 EARTH Psychic monstersGains 100 ATK for each material attached to it. You can detach 6 materials with the same card type (Monster, Spell, or Trap) from this card; send 1 Psychic monster from your Deck to your GY, and if you do, banish as many non-Psychic monsters you control as possible (if any), then you take 600 damage. During the Battle Phase (Quick Effect): You can send the top card of your opponents Deck to the GY, then attach all cards in their GY with the same card type (Monster, Spell, or Trap) as the sent monster to this card as material. You can only use each effect of "Etherea, Valedictorian of Maple High" once per turn.
1834020.name: Etherea, Valedictorian of Maple High

1889972.effect: 2+ Level 6 monstersIf this card is Xyz Summoned: You can add 1 "Wattkinetic Puppeteer" from your Deck to your hand. You can Normal Summon 1 "Wattkinetic Puppeteer" in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) Once per turn, if a face-up monster(s) is moved to another of their controller's Main Monster Zone(s) (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 of those face-up monsters; until the end of the next turn, negate any attack or effect activated by that target, also if that target's attack or effect is negated by this effect, destroy it.
1889972.name: Psy Ops Sona

1890122.effect: 2+ Level 6 monstersDuring your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; during the End Phase of this turn, Special Summon as many monsters as possible that were destroyed by battle or by your opponent's card effects and sent to your GY this turn. During the End Phase: You can Set 1 "Three Strikes Barrier" directly from your Deck or GY. You can only use each effect of "Sierra, Diviner of Past and Future" once per turn.
1890122.name: Sierra, Diviner of Past and Future
1890122.treated_as: Sierra, Diviner of Past and Future

1890412.effect: 2+ Level 6 Dinosaur and/or Plant monstersAll Dinosaur monsters you control gain 100 ATK for each Plant monster in your GY, except "Broccolisaur". Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 other face-up monster on the field; it gains 500 ATK, and if it does, the controller of that monster gains LP equal to that monster's DEF.
1890412.name: Broccolisaur

1889168.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fiend.)If you control no face-up monsters or you only control face-up "Darkest Forest" monsters, you can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, you can Special Summon 1 "Darkest Forest" monster from your hand or GY, then banish the top card from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "The Creature from the Darkest Forest" once per turn. If this card is sent to the Graveyard as a Synchro Material of a Yokai Synchro Monster, you can banish this card instead.
1889168.name: The Creature from the Darkest Forest
1889168.treated_as: The Creature from the Darkest Forest

1889155.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fiend.)If you control no face-up monsters or you only control face-up "Darkest Forest" monsters, you can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, you can Special Summon 1 banished "Darkest Forest" monster, then banish the top card from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "The Fox from the Darkest Forest" once per turn, and if you do, you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Darkest Forest" monsters. If this card is sent to the Graveyard as a Synchro Material of a Yokai Synchro Monster, you can banish this card instead.
1889155.name: The Fox from the Darkest Forest
1889155.treated_as: The Fox from the Darkest Forest

1889140.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fiend.)If you control a face-up Yokai monster, you can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you control 2 or more face-up Yokai monsters including at least 1 "Darkest Forest" monster, you can Special Summon this card from your GY or while its banished instead, then banish the top card from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "The Hound from the Darkest Forest" once per turn, and if you do, you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Darkest Forest" monsters. If this card is sent to the Graveyard as a Synchro Material of a Yokai Synchro Monster, you can banish this card instead.
1889140.name: The Hound from the Darkest Forest
1889140.treated_as: The Hound from the Darkest Forest

1889216.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fiend.)If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of an "Darkest Forest" card: You can add 1 "Darkest Forest" card from your GY or that is banished to your hand. You can only use this effect of "The Moose from the Darkest Forest" once per turn, and if you do, you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Darkest Forest" monsters. If this card is sent to the Graveyard as a Synchro Material of a Yokai Synchro Monster, you can banish this card instead.
1889216.name: The Moose from the Darkest Forest
1889216.treated_as: The Moose from the Darkest Forest

1889213.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fiend.)If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of an "Darkest Forest" card: You can add 1 "Darkest Forest" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "The Pegasus from the Darkest Forest" once per turn, and if you do, you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Darkest Forest" monsters. If this card is sent to the Graveyard as a Synchro Material of a Yokai Synchro Monster, you can banish this card instead.
1889213.name: The Pegasus from the Darkest Forest
1889213.treated_as: The Pegasus from the Darkest Forest

1889082.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fiend.)If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower "Darkest Forest" monster from your hand, or, if you control another face-up Yokai monster, you can Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower "Darkest Forest" from your Deck instead. You can only use this effect of "The Raven from the Darkest Forest" once per turn, and if you do, you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Darkest Forest" monsters. If this card is sent to the Graveyard as a Synchro Material of a Yokai Synchro Monster, you can banish this card instead.
1889082.name: The Raven from the Darkest Forest
1889082.treated_as: The Raven from the Darkest Forest

1889110.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fiend.)If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower "Darkest Forest" monster that its banished or in your GY, or, if you control another face-up Yokai monster, you can Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower "Darkest Forest" from your hand instead, then banish the top card from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "The Reaper" from the Darkest Forest" once per turn, and if you do, you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Darkest Forest" monsters. If this card is sent to the Graveyard as a Synchro Material of a Yokai Synchro Monster, you can banish this card instead.
1889110.name: The Reaper from the Darkest Forest
1889110.treated_as: The Reaper from the Darkest Forest

1889125.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fiend.)If you control a face-up Yokai monster, you can Special Summon this card from your hand, or, if you control 2 or more face-up Yokai monsters including at least 1 "Darkest Forest" monster, you can Special Summon this card from your GY or while its banished instead, then banish the top card from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "The Sheep from the Darkest Forest" once per turn, and if you do, you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Darkest Forest" monsters. If this card is sent to the Graveyard as a Synchro Material of a Yokai Synchro Monster, you can banish this card instead.
1889125.name: The Sheep from the Darkest Forest
1889125.treated_as: The Sheep from the Darkest Forest

1890205.effect: If this card is activated: You can add 1 Level 4 or lower "Darkest Forest" monster from your Deck to your hand. While this card is face-up on the field, "Darkest Forest" monsters you control cannot be targeted by card effects, except Yokai monster's effects. If a Yokai monster is banished by its own effect: You can Draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "The Darkest Forest" once per turn.
1890205.name: The Darkest Forest

1890223.effect: 1 Yokai Tuner monster + 1+ "Darkest Forest" non-Tuner Synchro monsters(This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fiend.)This card cannot be targeted or destroyed by card effects, except Yokai monster's effects. If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can banish all other cards on the field. You can shuffle up to 5 banished "Darkest Forest" cards back into the Deck; Special Summon up to 2 "Darkest Forest" monsters from your hand, Deck or that are banished, but make its ATK 0, and also negate the effects of at least 1. If this card is sent to GY: You can banish it instead. If this card is banished: You can shuffle all of your banished "Darkest Forest" cards, and if you do, Draw 2 cards. You can only use each effect of "The Golden Ram from the Darkest Forest" once per turn.
1890223.name: The Golden Ram from the Darkest Forest
1890223.treated_as: The Golden Ram from the Darkest Forest

1890218.effect: 1 Yokai Tuner monster + 1+ "Darkest Forest" non-Tuner monsters(This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fiend.)If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can banish 1 random card from your opponent's hand or banish 1 card on the field. You can shuffle 3 banished "Darkest Forest" cards back into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Darkest Forest" monster from your hand or up to 2 "Darkest Forest" monsters that are banished, but negate their effects. If this card is sent to GY: You can banish it instead. If this card is banished: You can draw 1 card or add 1 banished "Darkest Forest" monster to your hand. You can only use each effect of "The Wendigo from the Darkest Forest" once per turn.
1890218.name: The Wendigo from the Darkest Forest
1890218.treated_as: The Wendigo from the Darkest Forest

1890216.effect: 1 Yokai Tuner monster + 1 "Darkest Forest" non-Tuner monster(This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fiend.)If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can add 1 "Darkest Forest" monster from your Deck to your hand, but you cannot add cards from the Deck to the hand for the rest of this turn, except "Darkest Forest" monsters (max.2). You can shuffle up to 2 "Darkest Forest" banished monsters into the deck, then target cards up to the number of cards shuffled back into the Deck by this effect; send them to GY. If this card is sent to GY: You can banish it instead. If this card is banished you can add to your hand 1 "Darkest Forest" Tuner monster that is banished or in your GY. You can only use each effect of "The Zebra from the Darkest Forest" once per turn.
1890216.name: The Zebra from the Darkest Forest
1890216.treated_as: The Zebra from the Darkest Forest
